history.proof: intros d plp tl H. induction H. - shelve. - apply plp_true_cons. + apply IHpl_path_recon. + shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_true plp (dta_non_empty_states d)

Premises:
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
Inductive pl_path_true : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop := plp_true_nil : forall m : Map bool, pl_path_true pl_path_nil m | plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
pl_path_rec_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_length plp = lst_length tl
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_length_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_non_empty_path_true_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_non_empty_path_true_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_length_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_0 = fun (_ : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty) (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat) (H0 : pl_path_recon d tl pl_path_nil) (_ : pl_tl_length prec_empty n) => let H2 : d = d -> tl = tl -> pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := match H0 in (pl_path_recon p t p0) return (p = d -> t = tl -> p0 = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl) with | pl_path_rec_nil d0 => fun (H2 : d0 = d) (H3 : tnil = tl) (H4 : pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil) => (fun H5 : d0 = d => let H6 : d0 = d := H5 in eq_ind_r (fun _ : preDTA => tnil = tl -> pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl) (fun H7 : tnil = tl...
dt_non_empty_r_4 : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (pl : pl_path), dt_non_empty_r_def_0 n -> pl_path_true pl (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) -> pl_path_incl pl p -> exists tl : term_list, liste_reconnait d p tl
pl_path_length = fix pl_path_length (plp : pl_path) : nat := match plp with | pl_path_nil => 0 | pl_path_cons _ p => S (pl_path_length p) end : pl_path -> nat
dt_non_empty_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_fix_0 : forall d : preDTA, lower_fix_point bool (ensemble_base state d) lem (dta_app_ne d) (dta_non_empty_states d)
dt_non_empty_fix_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
pl_non_empty_path_true : forall (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true
pl_tl_length_rec_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_rec_length_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dt_non_empty_7 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> pl_non_empty (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (term_high_0 t)) p = true
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
pl_path_true_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop, (forall m : Map bool, P pl_path_nil m) -> (forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> P pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> P (pl_path_cons a pl) m) -> forall (p : pl_path) (m : Map bool), pl_path_true p m -> P p m
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 = fun (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) => forall m : Map bool, pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl

``` 
intros d plp tl H.
induction H.
- intros H1 H2. apply pl_path_true_nil.
- intros H1 H2. apply plp_true_cons.
  + apply IHpl_path_recon. apply H1.
  + apply H2.
```
